apiDescription:
Terminal is a unified API that makes it easy to integrate with the leading telematics service providers.

Contact Support:
 Name: Terminal
 Email: connect@withterminal.com
metaDescription: Terminal is Plaid for Telematics in commercial trucking. Companies building the next generation of insurance products, financial services and fleet software for trucking use our Universal API to access GPS data, speeding data and vehicle stats.Check us out at https://withterminal.com

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor to start requests from

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in a page.

parameters.name: startMonth
parameters.description: (Required) The month from which to start including vehicle reports

parameters.name: endMonth
parameters.description: (Required) Include vehicle reports up to and including this month

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: Computes the total distance traversed within a specified month range, with the results grouped by either jurisdiction, vehicle, or both. If no grouping parameter is provided, the default grouping is `vehicle,jurisdiction`.

repositoryDescription: Terminal is Plaid for Telematics in commercial trucking. Companies building the next generation of insurance products, financial services and fleet software for trucking use our Universal API to access GPS data, speeding data and vehicle stats.Check us out at https://withterminal.com.
